name: Arzani Generalist Agent
description: A generalist orchestration agent that routes queries to specialist agents in the Arzani Marketplace ecosystem

tasks/send.description: Route queries to appropriate specialist agents

parts.text: I need a valuation of my eCommerce business with $500K annual revenue and $150K EBITDA.

human_support.escalation_description: If you need additional help beyond what our AI can provide, a human specialist can be contacted at hello@arzani.co.uk
